mapper.update: update db_competitorlist set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAYONLINENUM = #{dayonlinenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YESTERDAYONLINENUM = #{yesterdayonlinenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WEEKONLINENUM = #{weekonlinenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MONTHONLINENUM = #{monthonlinenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATRTIME = #{creatrtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, USERNAME, SHOPNAME, DAYONLINENUM, YESTERDAYONLINENUM, WEEKONLINENUM, MONTHONLINENUM, CREATRTIME, UPDATETIME from db_competitorlist where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, USERNAME, SHOPNAME, DAYONLINENUM, YESTERDAYONLINENUM, WEEKONLINENUM, MONTHONLINENUM, CREATRTIME, UPDATETIME from db_competitorlist
